website_summaries.verdict: Hate putting patio furniture together? Have no fear, this Modway outdoor coffee table comes already assembled and ready to go. A quality choice for someone who wants a table with a large surface area for serving and entertaining.
pros: We thought the glass top on this table was a nice touch
It's simple to clean if anything spills on it, and it stays on securely with strong suction cups
All of the materials used here feel strong and reliable
We loved that there was enough space to serve food and drinks on this table as well
cons: The silver legs of the table, and visible suction cups on top were aesthetically unappealing

customer_reviews.title: great costumer service..but do have some caution for the product
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for our previous unit that the glass literal exploded all over the deck. Great customer service by Amazon... a but wary of whether the glass was a one off fluck or whether its a design flaw. we shall see..at the moment all is good
customer_reviews.author: Alan Hart

customer_reviews.title: Not pretty enough for me...
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap looking and feeling, the suction cups on the glass are ugly, and the silver/white feet look odd. It also doesn't sit level. I'll probably give it away or trash it.
customer_reviews.author: kaizenn

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall poor quality unit. Mine came with the chrome feet not aligned properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as pictured, no hassle needed as it's already put together. Just unwrap and put it where you want it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for outdoors and fitting in well with my own outdoor furniture
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: No Glass Top
customer_reviews.text: I thought it came with a glass top like my other one, but it did not. That was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MsPrissy

customer_reviews.title: ... friend has this on her patio and it looks amazing. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My friend has this on her patio and it looks amazing. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaMama

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful outdoor table
customer_reviews.text: Love this outdoor table 😍 Ordered another one to put together for more table space
customer_reviews.author: Marletta Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fits perfectly with my outside living room area.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpack26

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this Patio Coffee Table for our backyard furniture and it looks great and is excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: SAM M.

product_meta.title: Modway Convene Wicker Rattan Outdoor Patio Coffee Table in Espresso
product_meta.description: Gather stages of sensitivity with the Convene outdoor sectional series. Made with a synthetic rattan weave and a powder-coated aluminum frame, Convene is a versatile outdoor collection that shifts and combines according to the spontaneous needs of the moment. Outfitted with all-weather fabric cushions, leave a positive impression on friends and family while enhancing your patio, backyard or poolside repast in this series of palpable distinction. This installment of the series is an Outdoor Patio Coffee Table.
feature_bullets: PATIO REFRESH - Update your backyard or porch with inviting outdoor furniture. Effortlessly accommodate the needs of your outdoor space with furniture that's great for both entertaining and relaxing

WEATHER-RESISTANT - Featuring a powder-coated aluminum frame, the modern outdoor patio coffee table set comes with an espresso brown synthetic rattan weave, with UV protection for years of outdoor use
CONTEMPORARY STYLE - Clean lines, squared corners, and a sleek profile enhance the modern look of this coffee table. The modular collection opens up endless configurations to suit many occasions
COFFEE TABLE MEASUREMENTS - Perfect for the porch, backyard, garden or poolside, this modern patio collection makes the most out of your outdoor area. Dimensions: 43.5"L x 23.5"W x 12.5"H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars24 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
